thread.section_title: Triple Crown Products Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Triple Crown Products | triplecrownproducts.com
thread.title: Ben Jocz
thread.title_full: Triple Crown Products reviewed by Ben Jocz

author: Ben Jocz
title: Ben Jocz
text:
We ordred polos with embroidered logos and they turned out great. The communication was awesome between art/design department and the customer and we were able to give feedback and see it take shape the same day. And they were shipped promptly and we have been wearing them to coach our classes ever since!
I definitely recommend Triple Crown!
